title: Hines' Steinbach: Commercial Real Estate on Firm Footing
description: David Steinbach, Hines’ global chief investment officer and managing partner, discusses the firm’s 2026 real estate investment outlook and the impact of data center demand on the property market with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
